item.title: 西班牙政府购买西班牙电信 6.98 亿欧元股份
item.description: 西班牙收购了西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）3% 的股份，以对抗沙特电信公司（Saudi Telecom Co.【原文：Spain has acquired a 3% stake in Telefonica SA as it seeks to counter Saudi Telecom Co.’s plan to increase its shareholding in the company.】

item.title: Blackstone 旗下 Encore 拟募集 5 亿美元优先股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Blackstone Inc.支持的 Encore Group USA 正寻求筹集至少 5 亿美元的优先股权，因为该公司正与高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc.-backed Encore Group USA is looking to raise at least $500 million of preferred equity as it works with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to deal with loans that are set to come due in the next two years, according to people familiar with matter.】

item.title: 一些交易商在投票前以 75% 的亏损赎回与特朗普有关联的 SPAC 股票
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新兴媒体公司上市时，一些空头支票公司的投资者自愿退出交易，损失了 75%。【原文：Some investors in the blank-check firm taking Donald Trump’s nascent media company public voluntarily took a 75% loss by pulling out of the deal.】

item.title: Pemex 详细介绍重大环境、社会和公司治理计划，投资者等待结果
item.description: 墨西哥国营石油公司周一制定了一项计划，将大幅减少排放、提高安全标准并投资于新的绿色技术，但 ESG 投资者表示，他们可能需要看到结果，才能向这家负债累累的公司注入更多资金。【原文：Mexico’s state oil company laid out a plan Monday to drastically cut emissions, improve safety standards and invest in new green technologies, but ESG investors say they may need to see results before infusing more capital in the debt-saddled company.】

item.title: 就在美国人上路之际，夏季油泵价格将达到每加仑 4 美元
item.description: 据美国汽车协会（AAA）汽车俱乐部称，随着石油在供应担忧中上涨，美国今年夏天的油价将攀升至 2022 年夏天以来的最高点，达到每加仑 4 美元。【原文：Pump prices this US summer are set to climb to the highest since the summer of 2022 — to $4 a gallon — as oil rises amid supply concerns, according to the AAA automobile club.】

item.title: 普渡大学市政债券交易对持有人造成超过 20% 的损失
item.description: 上周末，在美国大学生体育协会（NCAA）举办的 "疯狂三月 "锦标赛中，普渡大学野人队击败了格兰布林州立大学和犹他州大学，球迷们沉浸在胜利的喜悦中。【原文：Fans of the Purdue University Boilermakers are reveling in victory after the top-ranked college basketball team trounced Grambling State and Utah State in the NCAA’s March Madness Tournament over the weekend.】

item.title: 庞巴迪通过增发垃圾债券借款7.5亿美元
item.description: 加拿大私人飞机制造商庞巴迪公司（Bombardier Inc.【原文：Canadian private-jet maker Bombardier Inc. sold a $750 million junk bond Friday to help refinance debt due in 2026, raising the size of the offering and getting slightly better terms than it initially expected.】

item.title: 底特律在破产十年后获得投资级评级
item.description: 曾经破产的底特律在穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）上调评级后首次获得了投资级评级，这标志着这座长期与高失业率和高贫困率作斗争的城市迈出了重要一步。【原文：Once-bankrupt Detroit has won its first investment-grade rating after an upgrade by Moody’s Ratings, marking a major step for the city, which has long struggled with high unemployment and elevated poverty rates.】

item.title: 据说 Advent 将出售 Idemia Identity 部门，以寻求新的出路
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 Advent International 正在寻求出售 Idemia 公司的欧洲身份验证业务，作为分拆计划的一部分，这家法国生物识别公司的三个部门将分别出售。【原文：Buyout firm Advent International is looking to sell the European identity authentication business of Idemia as part of a breakup plan that will see each of the French biometrics company’s three units being sold separately, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普的社交媒体公司将于周二在纳斯达克交易
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司在完成一笔空白支票交易后，将于周二开始交易，这笔交易可能会给他带来一笔意外之财。【原文：Former president Donald Trump’s social media startup is set to begin trading Tuesday after completing a blank-check deal that may bring him a financial windfall.】

item.title: 可可危机加深，加纳将失去获得银行贷款的机会
item.description: 由于可可作物的危机，加纳没有足够的可可豆来获得资金，因此加纳将失去获得关键融资机制的机会。【原文：Ghana is set to lose access to a key funding facility as a crisis in its cocoa crop has left it without enough beans to secure the funds.】

item.title: 美联储着眼于长期提高利率，垃圾股市场发出警告
item.description: 在美联储的加息行动之后，评级为垃圾级的美国公司的利息成本上升，但利润却没有跟上，这对财务状况造成了压力，也凸显了在这种趋势持续的情况下，高收益债券投资者面临的一个主要风险。【原文：Junk-rated US companies have seen their interest costs rise after the Federal Reserve’s rate-hike campaign, but profits haven’t kept up, putting a squeeze on finances and underscoring a key risk for investors in high-yield debt as the trend persists.】

item.title: 乌克兰认为欧盟谷物辩论更多涉及政治而非贸易
item.description: 乌克兰农业部长表示，几个欧盟成员国推动限制从乌克兰进口谷物是出于政治动机，而不是这些国家政府的经济问题。【原文：A push by several European Union member states to limit the import of grain from Ukraine is politically motivated and not an economic problem for those governments, the country’s agriculture minister said.】

item.title: 美国糖业寻求遏制墨西哥进口
item.description: 在美国表示将审查来自拉美国家的一些货物是否违反了贸易协议规则之后，美国糖生产商正在寻求遏制从墨西哥的进口。【原文：American sugar producers are seeking to curb imports from Mexico after the US said it would examine whether some shipments from the Latin American nation breached trade deal rules.】

item.title: 收债公司 Intrum 称有现金支付即将到期的债务
item.description: 欧洲最大的收债公司之一 Intrum AB 表示，将在未来几周内启动与债权人的谈判，以设法管理其债务负担。【原文：One of Europe’s biggest debt collectors, Intrum AB, said talks with creditors will kick off in the coming weeks as it seeks to manage its debt burden.】

item.title: 垃圾股发行人急于再融资，利差为 2022 年以来最低
item.description: 周一，至少有六家美国公司正在利用高收益债券市场，因为投资者要求的高于国债的额外收益率徘徊在两年来的最低点。【原文：At least six US companies are tapping the high-yield bond market Monday as the extra yield investors demand over Treasuries hovers at a two-year low.】

item.title: 麦格理称，随着成本下降，美国石油产量将增至创纪录水平
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）分析师在一份报告中说，由于成本下降和钻井效率的提高盖过了上市公司低迷的增长计划，美国石油产量将在今年年底达到创纪录的每天约 1400 万桶。【原文：US oil production is set to end the year at a record pace of about 14 million barrels a day as falling costs and improved drilling efficiency overshadow subdued growth plans from publicly listed companies, Macquarie Group Ltd. analysts said in a note.】

item.title: 美联储库克强调对降息采取 "谨慎 "态度的必要性
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）表示，美国央行必须对降息采取谨慎态度，以便留出更多时间让部分经济领域的通胀放缓。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said the US central bank must take a cautious approach to cutting interest rates to allow more time for inflation to slow down in some segments of the economy.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Politan 寻求 Masimo 增加两个董事会席位
item.description: 波利坦资本管理公司（Politan Capital Management）正寻求在 Masimo 公司董事会中增加两个席位，这是该公司多年来第二次参加代理权争夺战。【原文：Politan Capital Management is seeking two more seats on the board of Masimo Corp., marking its second proxy battle at the health-care technology company in as many years.】

item.title: 宏利为 43 亿美元保单达成再保险协议
item.description: 宏利金融公司（Manulife Financial Corp.）达成了另一项交易，同意与加拿大 RGA 人寿再保险公司（RGA Life Reinsurance Co. of Canada）就 58 亿加元（43 亿美元）的加拿大保单进行再保险，以剥离部分盈利能力较差的资产。【原文：Manulife Financial Corp. has struck another deal to offload some of its less-profitable assets, agreeing to reinsure C$5.8 billion ($4.3 billion) of Canadian policies with RGA Life Reinsurance Co. of Canada.】

item.title: 菲斯科与汽车制造商的谈判结束，破产风险上升
item.description: 陷入困境的电动汽车初创企业菲斯科公司（Fisker Inc.【原文：Struggling electric vehicle startup Fisker Inc. said in a regulatory filing that talks with a major automaker about an investment were terminated without a deal, which means the company needs to renegotiate terms for recent financing or face the possibility of filing for bankruptcy protection.】

item.title: 通胀降温，美联储主席古尔斯比预计今年将降息三次
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他是预计今年将降息三次的决策者之一。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said he is among policymakers anticipating three interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 光速公司首席执行官达西尔瓦表示公司对私有化持 "开放 "态度
item.description: 加拿大光速商务公司（Lightspeed Commerce Inc.）的负责人告诉蒙特利尔一家新闻媒体，最近有关支付公司 Nuvei Corp. 可能被私募股权收购的谈判让他思考自己的公司是否也应该这样做。【原文：The head of Canada’s Lightspeed Commerce Inc. told a Montreal news outlet that recent talks about a potential private equity buyout of payments firm Nuvei Corp. have him thinking about whether his company should do the same.】

item.title: 赞比亚与债券持有人达成协议，在长达数年的争论中取得关键胜利
item.description: 赞比亚已同意重组 30 亿美元的欧元债券，扫清了拖延其三年之久的摆脱债务违约的关键障碍，这对其他寻求债权人交易的国家也有影响。【原文：Zambia has agreed to restructure $3 billion in eurobonds, clearing a key hurdle that’s delayed its three-year effort to escape debt default with implications for other nations seeking creditor deals.】

item.title: 中国总理表示，中国为实现 2024 年目标开了个好头
item.description: 李强总理表示，自 2024 年伊始，中国经济复苏态势持续向好，这凸显了中国政府在接待一系列高规格访客时为树立信心所做的努力。【原文：China’s economic recovery has been improving since the start of 2024, Premier Li Qiang said, underscoring the government’s effort to project confidence as it hosts a slew of high-profile visitors.】

item.title: 最新出售后英国不再拥有 NatWest 的控股权
item.description: 英国政府不再被视为 NatWest Group Plc 的控股股东，因为它将继续加速退出这家在金融危机中救助过的贷款机构。【原文：The UK government is no longer considered a controlling shareholder in NatWest Group Plc as it continues to hasten its exit from the lender it rescued in the financial crisis.】
